content: प्रतीतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Conviction, settled belief; <ls>Ś. 7. 31.</ls> {@--2@} Belief. {@--3@} Knowledge, ascertainment, clear or distinct perception or apprehension; अपि तु वाच्यवैचित्र्यप्रतिभासादेव चारुताप्रतीतिः <ls>K. P. 10.</ls> {@--4@} Fame, renown. {@--5@} Respect. {@--6@} Delight. {@--7@} Going towards, approaching.
